vernac_cmds: Definition net_tail (j:DS_set J) := Im [ i:DS_set J | DS_ord j i ] x.
Definition tail_filter_basis : Family (point_set X) := Im Full_set net_tail.
Lemma net_limit_impl_tail_filter_limit: forall x0:point_set X, net_limit x x0 -> filter_limit tail_filter x0.
Lemma tail_filter_limit_impl_net_limit: forall x0:point_set X, filter_limit tail_filter x0 -> net_limit x x0.
Lemma net_cluster_point_impl_tail_filter_cluster_point: forall x0:point_set X, net_cluster_point x x0 -> filter_cluster_point tail_filter x0.
Lemma tail_filter_cluster_point_impl_net_cluster_point: forall x0:point_set X, filter_cluster_point tail_filter x0 -> net_cluster_point x x0.
pose proof (closure_impl_meets_every_open_neighborhood _ _ _ H2 U H0 H1).
Record filter_to_net_DS_set : Type := { ftn_S : Ensemble (point_set X); ftn_x : point_set X; ftn_S_in_F : In (filter_family F) ftn_S; ftn_x_in_S : In ftn_S ftn_x }.
refine (Build_DirectedSet filter_to_net_DS_set (fun x1 x2:filter_to_net_DS_set => Included (ftn_S x2) (ftn_S x1)) _ _).
exists (Build_filter_to_net_DS_set (Intersection ftn_S0 ftn_S1) ftn_x' H H0).
Definition filter_to_net : Net filter_to_net_DS X := ftn_x.
Lemma filter_limit_impl_filter_to_net_limit: forall x0:point_set X, filter_limit F x0 -> net_limit filter_to_net x0.
Lemma filter_to_net_limit_impl_filter_limit: forall x0:point_set X, net_limit filter_to_net x0 -> filter_limit F x0.
pose proof (H3 (Build_filter_to_net_DS_set ftn_S0 x ftn_S_in_F0 H4)).
Lemma filter_cluster_point_impl_filter_to_net_cluster_point: forall x0:point_set X, filter_cluster_point F x0 -> net_cluster_point filter_to_net x0.
pose proof (closure_impl_meets_every_open_neighborhood _ _ _ H2 U H0 H1).
Lemma filter_to_net_cluster_point_impl_filter_cluster_point: forall x0:point_set X, net_cluster_point filter_to_net x0 -> filter_cluster_point F x0.
pose (j0 := Build_filter_to_net_DS_set S y H0 H3).
destruct (H U H1 H2 j0) as [j' []].

refine (Build_DirectedSet filter_to_net_DS_set (fun x1 x2:filter_to_net_DS_set => Included (ftn_S x2) (ftn_S x1)) _ _).
exists (Build_filter_to_net_DS_set (Intersection ftn_S0 ftn_S1) ftn_x' H H0).
pose proof (H3 (Build_filter_to_net_DS_set ftn_S0 x ftn_S_in_F0 H4)).
pose proof (closure_impl_meets_every_open_neighborhood _ _ _ H2 U H0 H1).
pose (j0 := Build_filter_to_net_DS_set S y H0 H3).
destruct (H U H1 H2 j0) as [j' []].
